author: mtosi
body:
while trying to fix some issues of the HLT menu raised by the PR 7698
we realized some code in the release was defining w/in the c++ code some parameters (instead of making use of the config files !)

this PR fixes this issue

and it works regardless the integration of the PR 7698
runTheMatrix.py -l 1306.0 worked properly
title: delete hardcoded handling of parameters
